import { useState } from "react"; function Donations() { // Example mock data (replace with API/db fetch later) const [donations, setDonations] = useState([ { id: 1, date: "2025-08-15", donor: "Juan Dela Cruz", bloodGroup: "A+", volume: 500, }, { id: 2, date: "2025-08-18", donor: "Maria Santos", bloodGroup: "O-", volume: 450, }, ]); return (
{/* Header */}

List of Donations

{/* Table */}
{donations.map((donation, index) => ( ))}
# Date Donor Blood Group Volume (ml) Action
{index + 1} {new Date(donation.date).toLocaleDateString("en-US", { month: "short", day: "numeric", year: "numeric", })} {donation.donor} {donation.bloodGroup} {donation.volume}
); } export default Donations;
